data.text: how about you all back off and leave everyone alone. let mac’s family and ariana deal with it for a while. they ain’t needing everyone taking everything into their own perspective when they don’t know anything about the situation.

she’s blamed herself for the terrorist attack in Manchester last year. she could potentially be dealing with PTSD because of it. ariana has her own shit to deal with let alone all of you roasting her for apparently pushing Mac to his overdose.

yeah okay may of sent him over the edge because going through a breakup in the public eye is horrendous. so maybe that’s what made him overdose. ariana has nothing to do with his overdose. have you not through of what ariana has been through this past year.
